props.name: color
props.description: Changes the link list background color on hover.

props.name: accordion
props.description: Toggles accordion functionality for the expanders.

props.name: bottomBorder
props.description: Toggles the bottom border of the last child element.

props.name: topBorder
props.description: Toggles the top border of the first child element.

props.name: className
props.description: Adds custom classes to the element.
